name: OpenLiberty-Sample-Servlet
description: The example uses Jenkins to build a container and then stores in quay.io for deploy with UCD

edges.from: Show Current Routes and Services in Cluster (rlange)

edges.to: Show Current Routes and Services in Cluster (rlange)

offsets.name: Show Current Routes and Services in Cluster (rlange)

properties.scriptBody:
#!/bin/bash
export KUBECONFIG=./kubeconfig
echo "I am user ${id}"
echo "My home directory is $HOME"
oc project rlange
echo "My current OpenShift project is $(oc project)"
echo ""
echo ""
echo "Routes in this namespace are:" 
oc get routes
echo ""
echo ""
echo "Services in this namespace are:"
oc get services

cachedAuthTokenRestriction.name: System Default
cachedAuthTokenRestriction.description: Used by default for any plugin steps without a specified token restriction

#!/bin/bash
export KUBECONFIG=./kubeconfig
oc login --token ${p:environment/oc-auth-token} --server=https://c117-e.us-south.containers.cloud.ibm.com:30443
echo "I am user ${id}"
echo "My home directory is $HOME"
oc project rlange
echo "My current OpenShift project is $(oc project)"
echo "Pods running in this namespace are" 
oc get pods
